floors.title: Scaleups

floors.description: The third floor is designed for growing and established company PLATFORM. PLATFORM plans to share its experience as one of the PLATFORM House benefits.

floors.title: Startups
floors.label: 2nd floor
floors.description: The second floor is designed for small starting companies which understand, appreciate and use the benefits of shared space.

floors.title: Freelancers
floors.label: 1st floor
floors.description: The first floor is designed for individual entrepreneurs and creatives who want to use smart offices, network and share experience with other like-minded people.

benefits.title: PLATFORM House It is not only about offices, it is about the lifestyle

list: Access to successful entrepreneurs and companies

items.title: Startups
items.description: Contact us for more information on small office rental.

location.title: Welcome to PLATFORM House, 5km from Bratislava city centre
location.label: Location

items.title: The greatest benefit of PLATFORM HOUSE in my eyes is merging of PLATFORM - a renowned digital agency with startups and freelancers. The agencies within PLATFORM HOUSE can involve freelancers working in the same building into their own projects.
I am looking forward to the concept that’s being put into practise and brings vivid interaction between PLATFORM and young companies as well as freelancers.
